description.value:
A set of codes from the following dm+d (dictionary of medicines and devices) concept classes that define a vaccine:
- AMP – Actual Medicinal Product (preferred) - VMP – Virtual Medicinal Product.
Where no dm+d coded information is available, a specific code from the nullFlavor Code System can be used instead to indicate this.
